name: Gabriel Coutinho
quote: Kelly is one of the most talented, creative and easy-to-get-along with photographers that I have worked with. He did an amazing job and we loved how natural the pictures came out.

name: James Torres Silva
quote: Kelly was excellent to work with. He was communicative and flexible in the run up to the photo shoot, and delivered some beautiful and engaging architectural focused photography. We'd certainly recommend Kelly for anyone looking to capture urban or architectural focused imagery.

name: Jovito D'costa
quote: Totally blown away by Kelly's capabilities. The guy is a total swiss army knife, able of covering any visual requirements thrown his way.

name: Camilo Dias
quote: Kelly was timely in all communication, quick to produce cinemagraphs and an absolute professional. Above all, his style is fun, perceptive and (without direction) he made sure to incorporate and uphold our brands image and style. Highly recommend!
